content: I do not have personal experiences. however, the sydney symphony orchestra has been known to interact with their audience during their shows by engaging them in different ways. this may include having the conductor or musicians speak to the audience about the pieces they are performing, answering questions from the audience, or even inviting members of the audience to participate in the performance. additionally, the orchestra may have special events or activities before or after the performance to give audience members a chance to connect with the performers and learn more about the music they are playing. overall, the goal of these interactions is to create a unique and engaging experience for the audience that goes beyond simply listening to the music being performed.
